page.title: 12SECONDARY SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: Our school offers a wide range of non academic facilities such as table tennis, snooker, darts .There are many clubs at dinner time and after school Our school has a school uniform which consists of a blazer,tie and a school badge. This is compulsory. Lessons start at 9.00am but pupils have to be in school by 8.40am for registration.In our school we have many lessons,eg:The Sciences(including Rural Science),Craft subjects and Physical Education.We can learn both French and German,also Latin.At the end of the 3rd year you take 5 Options plus Maths and English. At the end of the 5th year you have your final exams. In the 6th year you can begin a 2 year A level course or take a variety of other courses.
